short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort By Review Count for Amazon allows you to sort Amazon search results by their number of reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sort By Review Count for amazon extension lets you sort items by their number of reviews & ratings. Most reviewed are now on top of amazon search

To sort by number of reviews, either click on the extension icon (the yellow star) or use the "Sort by Review Count" button.

NOTE :
#1 Always select a SPECIFIC DEPARTMENT before sorting by review count
#2 Do not "sort by review count" in the "All in One" general department

This extension took me ≈30 min to code. 
If you liked it, give me a good rating. 

Thank you,

Sébastien Barette-Tremblay

(updated & working - July 2024)
